description: ACLEDA mobile is a FinTech Application running on Smart Phone, enabling customers to do banking transactions from anywhere, anytime.

Ever wonder how other people maximize their time? They do not visit physical banks, wait for their change every purchase, or line up in long queues to pay bills. Instead, they do all of these things in one platform. A platform that caters to all Cambodians.

The Wing Bank App is your ever-reliable mobile banking companion. Send money to anyone in Cambodia and other parts of the globe, pay your bills on-time, top up your phone, and shop online in just a few clicks. It’s safe, convenient, easy-to-use, and fast so you can do it anywhere, anytime. Get the Wing Bank App today!
 
Here’s how you can maximize your Wing Money App:
•Opt for cashless transactions to ensure the safety of your money.
•Consistently check your account activity.
•Use for convenient day-to-day payments.
 
SEND MONEY
•Send and receive money anywhere in Cambodia.
•Send money from one Wing account to another via Wing-2-Wing. 
•Send money from one Wing account to a non-Wing user via Wing WeiLuy.
•Send and receive money to or from international remittance partners globally. International partners are located from different parts of the globe!
•Transfer money from Wing to a bank account and vices versa.
 
PHONE TOP-UP
•Top-up your phone easily with any amount via Wing.
•Top-up your family members or your friend’s phone or buy them phone credits via Wing.
•List of available mobile providers: Cellcard, Metaphone, Smart, QB, CooTel, and Yes Seatel.
 
BILL PAYMENT
•Make online bill payment directly from the Wing Money app.
•Electricity, water, insurance, internet cable? Wing has got you covered! Enjoy hassle-free payment at the comfort of your own home! Do all of these in a click of a button and pay all of your utilities on time.
 
WINGPAY
•Scan the QR Code and easily pay Wing’s partner merchants using the app. No need to bring actual cash or physical card! Amazing, right?
•No cash, no risk. Enjoy the cashless way of spending your money.
 
WING ONLINE MASTERCARD
•Have total control of your money! Use your Wing Online Mastercard and enjoy cashless transactions from different local and international brands.
•It’s a Mastercard, which means it’s accepted worldwide! Shop at different merchants at the convenience of your home.
•No need to wait long queues. Just one click, your purchase is fast and secure.
•Completely virtual. No actual cash needed.
 
WING2WORLD
Enjoy international money transfers using the Wing Money App. It's as simple as pressing a few buttons!
 
In-bound service: Migrant workers can easily send their money to any of Wing Partner's in more than 200 countries and receiving is easy.
Outbound service: Cambodians or expats can send their hard-earned money to anyone in real-time using the Wing Money App. 
We now partner with Western Union and MoneyGram for more coverages 

WING ANG PAO
Save papers and don’t use actual red packets! Gift your friends any amount with the Wing Ang Pao. All it takes is a few simple steps! Select "Individual" or "Group" and enter the recipient's Wing account or phone number. 
 
Business with Wing? Talk to us and we'll help you.
 
WINGSME
Affordable business settlement and disbursement? Manage your business transactions with WingSME. Grow your business with Wing, maximize all opportunities, offer more services to clients, and enjoy all benefits. 
 
WINGBIZ+
Payroll system is all over the place? Secure the disbursements of your funds and make sure payroll is on time through Wing!
 
Effectiveness: 
1. It cuts off the unnecessary backend headcounts
2. Employees can withdraw anytime!
3. No maintenance fee.
 
Productivity:
1. One-click solution to disburse funds.
2. Save time for approval of processes.
3. Avail all the features on the Wing Money App.
 
Hassle-free:
1. Get your salary on time!
2. Risk-free of handling cash.
 
Wing is with you wherever, whenever. Bring your everyday wallet and start a cashless society! Invite your friends to download the app today and register their Wing accounts!

Amret Mobile brings everyday banking services closer to you. Be it a bank transfer, E-wallet top-up, loan repayment, phone top-up, bill payments, or even loan request, you can perform all the services anytime anywhere at the comfort of your smartphone.

KB PRASAC Mobile is a user-friendly app that allows users to manage finances at their fingertips anywhere and anytime in a secure manner.

You can open a digital account, instantly pay the bills, transfer within the Bank and to other banks, manage your accounts easily, open and view term deposit accounts, top up phone, withdraw and deposit cash via ATM QR, check account balance, and enjoy more great features.

Terms and Conditions are subject to change at the KB PRASAC’s sole discretion without prior notice.

For more inquiry, please kindly call us at +855 (0) 86 999 911 or +855 (0) 23 999 911, or email us at info@kbprasacbank.com.kh, or visit www.kbprasacbank.com.kh, or visit any bank branch nearest to you.

Buy, sell, trade, store and discover hundreds of cryptocurrencies and bitcoin (BTC). OKX is used by over 60 million registered users globally across 160+ countries. Winner of the 'Best Crypto Exchange' award by TradingView based on user feedback: https://www.tradingview.com/broker-awards/


One App. Many Possibilities:

● Buy and sell bitcoin (BTC) and crypto.
● Token discovery from hundreds of crypto assets, including bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), BNB, Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB).
● Advanced trading and charting tools for bitcoin (BTC) and crypto.
● Move funds from our crypto exchange to your wallet.


How OKX helps protect your assets
 
● Online and offline crypto storage systems with multiple backups and multisig protection means multiple signatures required to transfer cryptocurrency assets.
● We don't lend out customer funds, which is verified through our regularly published Proof of Reserves Audits.

WARNING: While we implement extensive security measures, cryptoassets remain high-risk and you could be targeted by cybercriminals.


Spot Trading Features 

● Hundreds of spot trading asset pairs in one app.
● Analyze the markets with detailed technical analysis tools, advanced live order books, and pro-trader charting tools, all powered by TradingView.

Trade tokens including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Pepe (PEPE) and hundreds more.


Global Presence, Local Support:

OKX has a presence on all four corners of the globe with support available in your timezone and language. Reach support at support@okx.com.


ABOUT OKX

OKX is a global digital asset platform offering access to a wide range of tools and services to support users in navigating the crypto market.

TrueMoney Wallet - the only wallet you need for your daily life.

Easy registration - you just need a Cambodian phone number to register for a TrueMoney Wallet account. Enjoy a true digital lifestyle.

Get a truly FREE Virtual Mastercard - make payments around the world at the best rate with no Currency exchange mark-up Fee & ZERO Hidden Fee” 

Enjoy never ending promotions - save every month on your daily expenses such as food, taxi, fashion, and entertainment.

Multiple ways to add money - fund-in your wallet is very easy with your KHQR compatible with over 30+ Banks, 10,000 TrueMoney Agents, and TrueCode.

Scan to pay anywhere - cashless payment at over 200,000+ retail stores via KHQR in Cambodia

Transfer money & pay your bills - save your time and make your transactions right from your home or anywhere at your fingertips

Safe & Secure - update your password safely via your mobile phone - 24/7 real-time monitoring and bank-grade data encryption, and your transactions 100% secure. If your phone is lost, your money is always safe with TrueMoney.

Do you work for yourself or run a small business? This app is for you!

With this app, you can:
- Join the official list of businesses. Get recognized and get help.
- Learn new skills. Get training to make your business better.
- Get funding to grow your business. Learn about loans and other programs.
- Get social assistance from the government.

How to use the app:
- Download the app on your phone.
- Tell us what kind of work you do.
- Get help if you need it.
- Wait for us to accept the application!

Why use the app?
- Make your work recognized.
- Learn how to make more money.
- Get help from the government.
- Connect with other people like you.

It's easy and free! Try it today!

Experience banking like never before with the redesigned Canadia Bank App 5.0. We've transformed the mobile banking experience into a personalized financial hub, tailored to your specific needs, giving you powerful tools and complete control of your money anytime, anywhere. Manage your finances seamlessly, from everyday transactions to long-term planning, within a secure and intuitive mobile environment.

Key Features:

• Effortless Account Management:
    • View all your accounts (savings, current, loans, term deposits, and more).
    • Check balances in multiple currencies (KHR, USD, THB, CNY).
    • Access detailed transaction history with powerful filters.
    • Download and share statements (PDF/Excel).
    • Personalize your account view (hide/show accounts, set alias names).
    • Quickly access your account QR code and information.
    • Easily manage joint accounts.

• Seamless Fund Transfers:
    • Make fast transfers between your Canadia Bank accounts and to other local banks via Bakong.
    • Make quick and convenient QR code payments using KHQR (Cambodia), Thai QR, and Viet QR for cross-border payments.
    • Manage your favorite payees for even faster transactions.

• Simplified Bill Payments:
    • Pay your bills quickly and easily, including mobile top-up and service payments.
    • Manage bill payment templates for recurring payments.
    • Scan your invoice directly to speed up the payment process.

• Card Management:
    • Apply for virtual cards instantly.
    • View card balances, statements, and payment history in real time.
    • Set spending and transaction limits.
    • Activate, block, or unblock cards and reset PINs.
    • Manage your credit cards: View balances, due dates, and statements; set spending limits; activate/deactivate cards; reset your PIN; and set up autopay.

• CanaPoints Loyalty Program:
    • Earn CanaPoints with every transaction.
    • Redeem CanaPoints for exclusive rewards, QR payments, or mobile top-ups.
    • Track your points and reward history.
    • Enjoy fun mini-games within the app.

• Enhanced Security & Control:
    • Protect your account with PIN, secret word, biometric authentication and device binding.
    • Receive real-time transaction notifications and customize your preferences.
    • Easily recover your PIN or Secret word.
    • Set an auto-logout period for enhanced security.
• Personalized Banking:
    • Change the app language (English, Khmer, Chinese).
    • Customize the app home screen background.
    • Adjust font size for enhanced readability.
    • Choose between dark and light mode.
    • Manage your profile information.

• Helpful Tools & Resources:
    • Contact support via hotline or social media channels.
    • Access security tips, user guides, and terms & conditions.
    • Find nearby ATMs, CRMs, VTMs, branches, and partner merchants.
    • Stay informed about the latest promotions, news, and events.
    • Use the built-in interest and exchange rate calculators.

Why Canadia Bank?

As one of Cambodia’s largest commercial banks, Canadia Bank provides secure and innovative banking solutions. The Canadia Bank App 5.0 empowers you with features for a simpler, personalized financial experience.

Getting Started:

Download the Canadia Bank App 5.0 and open your first account now to start earning loyalty points and rewards!

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Turn your smartphone into a powerful business tool with the Hattha Merchant App — the easiest way to accept KHQR payments and manage your sales. Whether you run one shop or many, the app helps you save time, reduce cash handling, and boost customer satisfaction.

Key benefits for your business:
 - Quick & simple setup – start accepting payments in minutes
 - Accept KHQR payments securely – no cash risk, no hidden costs
 - Faster checkout experience – keep customers happy with instant confirmations
 - Manage multiple shops & counters – monitor sales anytime, anywhere
 - Refund with ease – resolve customer issues quickly
 - Safe & compliant – built with industry-standard security for your peace of mind


Getting started is simple: download the app for free, link it to your Hattha savings account, and you’re ready to grow your business with seamless digital payments.

“AMK Mobile” is a Mobile Banking application which will be used by Customers of AMK Microfinance Institution Plc (refer to as AMK) in Cambodia. AMK is a Microfinance deposit taking institution licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. AMK has been granted with a MDI license to operate financial services in Cambodia and we provide variety of financial services including: Credit, Non credit, Fund transfer, Bill payment, and other financial services.

AMK Mobile Banking allows our customers to perform both financial and non-financial transactions. Example:
 
  • Bill payment
  • Fund transfer
  • Mobile Topup
  • Partner Mobile Wallet topup
  • QR Pay
  • Others

AMK Mobile Banking is a secure application to be used by customers for banking with us. Every financial transaction will be executed with customer's authorization.

It allows NSSF members to access their personal information, monitor your work history and statement transaction at NSSF. It’s an easy way to contact NSSF anywhere, anytime.

This app is designed to make it easier for taxpayers and the general public to:
- Check vehicle information and real estate information that was registered and updated in the data management system of the General Department of Taxation.
- Pay vehicle and transportation tax and annual property tax without having to fill in the tax return form.
- Save time without having to go to pay taxes at provincial / Khan tax branches or commercial bank branches that are partners of the General Department of Taxation
- Obtain annual Latabat of vehicle and transportation tax to your place for payment of this tax.
- Receive other notification such as: date of tax declaration, date of expiration of tax payment, declaration of tax deficit in any taxable period and other notification related to vehicle and transportation tax and property tax.

PPCBank mobile banking is a secure application from Phnom Penh Commercial Bank Plc. It lets you effortlessly manage your finances, budget, and access smart financial advice. With PPCBank mobile banking, you can access a range of features such as:
Seamless Account Opening
Instantly open a PPCBank Fast Account in just a few simple steps using Cambodian or Korea Phone Number—anytime, anywhere.
Comprehensive Financial Snapshot
View your savings and loan balances in a unified interface for real-time financial insight.
Remote Account Management
Open or close deposit and loan accounts from the convenience of your mobile device.
Smart Transfers
Make instant or scheduled transfers between PPCBank accounts or to other local banks in real-time via Bakong and the National Clearing House.
International Transfers Made Easy
Send funds overseas through SWIFT, Western Union, or manage inward telegraphic transfers (ITT) efficiently.
Cardless Cash Withdrawals
Withdraw cash securely at PPCBank ATMs without using a physical card.
Mobile & Prepaid Top-Up
Recharge mobile credits and prepaid cards with either pinless or pin-code options.
Card Services Management
Apply for new cards, or manage existing ones securely and efficiently through the app.
Convenient Bill Payments
Pay utility bills and merchant invoices directly through the app.
Instant QR Payment in Cambodia and Overseas
Instantly scan and pay at any KHQR-supported store, including ThaiQR, VietQR, and LaoQR.
Rewards Tracking
View and manage reward points earned from transactions, redeemable for exclusive gifts.
Multilingual Support
Use the app in your preferred language—available in five languages including Khmer, English, Chinese, Korean and Japanese for broader accessibility.
Location Services
Easily find ATMs, CDMs, branches, and partner merchants offering corporate discounts.
Additional Features
Enjoy continuous enhancements for an even better digital banking experience.

App Permission:
You are required by the app store to accept App Permissions to allow access to certain functions on your device.  Functions will not be access until you use the associated feature, such as using your location to find PPCBank nearest branch/ATM.
Terms/service agreement: at any PPCBank branch
For more information visit: www.ppcbank.com.kh
Phnom Penh Commercial Bank Plc.
© 2025

ABA Merchant is free to use mPOS solution for any sized businesses including an individual entrepreneurs who has an account with ABA Bank. Your business can be a cafe, phone shop, beauty salon, delivery service or any other business. You just need to download the app, activate with your ABA account and you are ready to start accepting payments from your customers.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Built for simplicity, security, and convenience, JTR Mobile is your everyday banking companion—whether you're at home, at work, or on the move.   From daily transactions to managing your personal finances, JTR Mobile puts you in control—anytime, anywhere.
 
Key Features   
• Easy self-activation in just a few steps 
• Fast, secure login with PIN or biometrics 
• Intuitive interface for smooth, effortless navigation 
• Save frequent transactions to “Favorites” for quicker access 
• Real-time access to account balances and transaction history

• Transfer funds within J Trust Royal or to other banks via Bakong 
• Pay bills for utilities, mobile top-up, internet, and more 
• Full card control—activate, pay, set limits, and view statements
